nodes.title: Enhanced Prompt (Positive)
widgets_values: Style: A red sport car with sleek aerodynamic lines . coastal highway at sunset with warm orange and purple skies reflecting off the ocean. A red hypercar with sleek aerodynamic lines cruises along a winding cliffside road, its headlights cutting through the fading light. The camera tracks alongside as tires hum against asphalt, waves crash softly below on rocky shores, and wind rustles through coastal shrubs. A woman’s voice, calm and reflective, says from inside the car, “This is where the road reminds you why you drive,” while the sun dips toward the horizon, painting the water in liquid gold.
blurry, low quality, still frame, frames, watermark, overlay, titles, has blurbox, subtitles

nodes.title: Enhanced Prompt (Positive)
widgets_values: Style: A red sport car with sleek aerodynamic lines . coastal highway at sunset with warm orange and purple skies reflecting off the ocean. The car accelerates smoothly into a gentle curve, leaning slightly into the turn as the cliff face rises sharply to the left and the ocean stretches endlessly to the right. The driver’s hand adjusts the steering wheel subtly, fingers tapping rhythmically. She continues, tone soft but focused, “Not for speed… not for show. For the moment,” as a flock of birds lifts off from the rocks below, their wings catching the last rays of sunlight.

nodes.title: Enhanced Prompt (Positive)
widgets_values: Style: A red sport car with sleek aerodynamic lines . coastal highway at sunset with warm orange and purple skies reflecting off the ocean. The car slows briefly as it approaches a small pull-off area overlooking the sea, tires crunching over gravel before coming to a stop. The engine idles quietly as she turns off the ignition, the only sounds now being the rhythmic crash of waves and distant gulls. She leans back, exhaling slowly, and murmurs, “Sometimes the best part isn’t the destination… it’s the pause,” while the sky deepens into crimson hues behind her.
For Low VRAM model files,  get it from this Hugging Face Repo: https://huggingface.co/Kijai/LTXV2_comfy/tree/main

For text encoder choose either one way to run with.

🅛🅣🅧 Gemma 3 Model Loader is using the way how ComfyUI_LTXVideo Github mention with Gemma 3 model weights to load. It need a lot more VRAM.

LTXV Audio Text Encoder Loader is native node of ComfyUI. 


Mentioned in previous tutorial, check it out if missed it.
